00058 
00059 typedef union
00060 {
00061         struct {
00062                 BOOL m_ON:1;                                            
00063                 BOOL m_OverCurrent:1;                           
00064                 BOOL m_OverVoltageProtection:1;         
00065                 BOOL m_UnderVoltageProtection:1;        
00066                 BOOL m_OverTemperature:1;                       
00067                 UINT8 m_filler0:3;                                      
00068                 BOOL m_CalibrationError:1;                      
00069         } m_bit;                                                                
00070         UINT16 m_word;                                                  
00071 } V8100_channel_status;
00072

00078 
00079 typedef union
00080 {
00081         struct {
00082                 BOOL m_ON:1;                                            
00083                 BOOL m_VCCSupplyFail:1;                         
00084                 BOOL m_PSTemperatureFail:1;                     
00085                 BOOL m_ACFail:1;                                        
00086                 BOOL m_VMESystemFail:1;                         
00087                 UINT8 m_filler0:4;                                      
00088                 BOOL m_FanON:1;                                         
00089                 BOOL m_Fan1Fail:1;                                      
00090                 BOOL m_Fan2Fail:1;                                      
00091                 BOOL m_Fan3Fail:1;                                      
00092                 BOOL m_FANTemperatureFail:1;            
00093         } m_bit;                                                                
00094         UINT16 m_word;                                                  
00095 } V8100_crate_status;
